docs.title: Help Center
docs.subtitle: Learn how to use BioStore with step-by-step guides.

landing.heroTitle: Turn your social media into a
landing.heroDescription: Create a beautiful storefront in seconds. Share one link in your bio. Receive orders directly — no coding needed.
landing.heroTrialNote: 3-day free trial — no credit card required
landing.step1Desc: Sign up, name your store, and add your products. It takes less than 2 minutes.
landing.step2Desc: Put your store link in your Instagram, TikTok, or WhatsApp bio. That's it.
landing.step3Desc: Customers browse, order via cash on delivery, and you get notified instantly.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need to sell online
landing.featureReadyDesc: Create your store, add products, share the link. That simple.
landing.featureMobileDesc: Your store looks perfect on phones — where your customers are.
landing.featureCodDesc: Cash on delivery. No online payment setup needed.
landing.featureDesignDesc: Custom colors, fonts, themes, and layout. Make your store truly yours.
landing.featureCollectionsDesc: Organize products into collections. Support sizes, colors, and more.
landing.featureAnalyticsDesc: Track visitors, sales, conversion rate, and revenue — all in one dashboard.
landing.featureIntegrationsDesc: Connect WhatsApp, Meta Conversions API, and Google Sheets to automate your workflow.
landing.featureDomainDesc: Connect your own domain for a professional storefront.
landing.featureLanguageDesc: Serve your customers in English, French, or Arabic with full RTL support.
landing.featureShippingDesc: Set delivery rates per country with city-level overrides. Fees auto-convert for multi-market stores.
landing.featureMarketsDesc: Sell to different regions with local currencies and custom pricing per market.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Lock in this price before new plans launch. Cancel anytime.
landing.pricingDescription: No tiers, no upsells. You get every feature we build.
landing.pricingTrialNote: 3-day free trial. No credit card required.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Get your store up and running in under 2 minutes
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything included in one simple plan
landing.faq1Question: Do I need any technical skills?
landing.faq1Answer: Not at all. BioStore is designed for non-technical users. You can create your store, add products, and start selling in under 2 minutes.
landing.faq2Answer: Your customers order via cash on delivery (COD). No online payment gateway or merchant account is needed.
landing.faq3Question: Can I use my own domain?
landing.faq3Answer: Yes! You can connect your own custom domain for a professional storefront. We provide step-by-step DNS setup instructions.
landing.faq4Question: What happens after the free trial?
landing.faq4Answer: After your 3-day free trial, simply subscribe for $15/month to keep your store running. You won't lose any of your products or settings.
landing.faq5Question: Can I sell in multiple languages?
landing.faq5Answer: Yes. BioStore supports English, French, and Arabic with full right-to-left (RTL) support.
landing.faq6Question: Can I sell in different currencies?
landing.faq6Answer: Yes! With Markets, you can create regions like "North America" (USD) and "Europe" (EUR) with automatic or fixed pricing per market. Customers are auto-detected by country.
landing.faq7Answer: You set a default delivery rate per country, then optionally override it for specific cities or exclude cities entirely. If your store uses multi-market pricing, delivery fees auto-convert at the same exchange rate. Customers see the fee at checkout before placing their order.
landing.ctaDescription: Join hundreds of sellers already using BioStore. Set up your store in under 2 minutes.
landing.previewDescription: Every store on BioStore is designed to convert. Mobile-first, fast, and fully customizable to match your brand.
landing.previewFeature1: 20+ color themes to match your brand identity
landing.previewFeature2: Product collections, variants, and smart search

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: BioStore ("we", "us", or "our") operates the BioStore platform. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our service.
privacy.collectText: We collect information you provide directly when creating an account, setting up a store, or placing an order. This includes your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address. Your city and country are also used to calculate applicable delivery fees based on the store's shipping zones. For store owners, we also collect payment and subscription details processed through our billing provider. We automatically collect usage data such as IP addresses, browser type, pages visited, and timestamps. We also collect approximate geolocation data (country) through IP-based detection to determine your regional market and display appropriate pricing and currency. When a customer abandons a checkout, we retain the cart contents and contact information to enable recovery notifications if the store owner has enabled this feature.
privacy.useText: We use the collected information to provide and maintain our service, process orders and transactions, communicate with you about your account or orders, detect your geographic region to display market-specific pricing and currency, calculate delivery fees based on your city and country, send abandoned cart recovery notifications via WhatsApp when enabled by the store owner, improve our platform and user experience, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell your personal information. We share data with store owners to fulfill your orders. Store owners may enable third-party integrations that transmit order and customer data to external services, including: WhatsApp (via Evolution API) for order notifications and abandoned cart reminders; Meta Conversions API for Facebook ad conversion tracking; TikTok Events API for TikTok ad conversion tracking; and Google Sheets for order data syncing. When data is sent to Meta or TikTok, personal identifiers such as name, phone number, and location are hashed using SHA-256 before transmission. We also share data with law enforcement when required by law.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to maintain your session, remember your preferences, and analyze usage patterns. We use a market preference cookie to remember your selected regional market and currency across visits. Store owners may enable client-side tracking pixels on their storefronts, including Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, and TikTok Pixel. These pixels may track page views, product views, add-to-cart events, and checkout initiation on the storefront. Purchase events are tracked server-side only through the Meta Conversions API and TikTok Events API.
privacy.securityText: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit and at rest, row-level security policies on our database, and SHA-256 hashing of personally identifiable information before transmission to third-party ad platforms. Integration credentials and access tokens are stored securely and are not accessible via public APIs. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You may also request a copy of your data or ask us to restrict its processing. Store owners can manage and disable any third-party integrations from their dashboard settings at any time. Contact us to exercise these rights.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@biostore.app.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to BioStore. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.
terms.accountText: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.subscriptionText: New accounts receive a 3-day free trial with full access to all features. After the trial ends, an active subscription at $15/month is required to keep your store and dashboard accessible. If you do not subscribe, your storefront will be paused until payment is made. Your products, settings, and data are retained and restored when you resubscribe. You may cancel your subscription at any time, and it will remain active until the end of the current billing period.
terms.storeText: As a store owner, you are responsible for the products you list, their descriptions, pricing, and fulfillment. You may configure regional markets with different currencies and pricing adjustments for your products. You may also configure shipping zones with delivery fees per country and optional city-level overrides; you are responsible for setting accurate delivery rates for the regions you serve. You are responsible for ensuring that your market-specific pricing complies with applicable consumer protection and pricing transparency laws in each region. You must comply with all applicable laws regarding the sale of your products, including consumer protection and tax regulations. You are also responsible for any third-party integrations you enable (WhatsApp, Meta, TikTok, Google Sheets) and for ensuring your use of those services complies with their respective terms.
terms.buyerText: When placing an order, you agree to provide accurate delivery information. Product prices may vary depending on your detected or selected regional market and may be displayed in different currencies. Delivery fees may apply based on the store's shipping zones and your city; these fees are displayed at checkout before you place your order. Prices shown are final for the selected market; switching markets may result in different pricing and will clear your cart. Orders are placed directly with the store owner, and BioStore acts as a platform facilitating the transaction. BioStore does not handle payments between buyers and store owners; all orders use cash on delivery (COD).
terms.integrationsText: Store owners may connect third-party services including WhatsApp Business (for order and abandoned cart notifications), Meta Conversions API and TikTok Events API (for ad conversion tracking), and Google Sheets (for order data syncing). By enabling an integration, you authorize BioStore to transmit relevant order and customer data to that service. You are responsible for complying with the terms and data policies of each third-party service you enable. BioStore is not responsible for how third-party services process the data once transmitted.
terms.contentText: You retain ownership of content you upload (product images, descriptions, etc.). By uploading content, you grant us a license to display it on the platform. You must not upload content that is illegal, harmful, or infringes on intellectual property rights.
terms.prohibitedText: You may not use the platform to sell illegal products, engage in fraud or deception, distribute malware, attempt to reverse-engineer the platform, or interfere with other users' access to the service.
terms.terminationText: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these terms. You may delete your account at any time. Upon termination, your store and its data may be permanently deleted.
terms.liabilityText: BioStore is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform, including but not limited to failed deliveries, integration outages, or third-party service disruptions. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you in the last 12 months.
terms.changesText: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes via email or platform notification. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@biostore.app.

googleSheets.title: Google Sheets
googleSheets.description: Automatically sync orders to a Google Spreadsheet
googleSheets.connectDescription: Sign in with Google to allow order syncing to your spreadsheets. We only request access to create and edit spreadsheets.
googleSheets.connectedBanner: Google account connected. Complete the setup below.
googleSheets.chooseSpreadsheetHint: Select an existing spreadsheet from your Google Drive or create a new one.
googleSheets.createNewHint: We'll create a new "Store Orders" spreadsheet in your Drive
googleSheets.linkExistingHint: Paste a Google Sheets URL or spreadsheet ID
googleSheets.settingsHint: Configure columns, row grouping, and sync options.
googleSheets.headersMatched: Headers were matched from your spreadsheet where possible.
googleSheets.columnMappingHint: Choose which fields to include and customize headers
googleSheets.rowGroupingHint: How order items are organized into rows
googleSheets.perProductHint: Same products are merged, quantities summed
googleSheets.perOrderHint: All items are combined into a single row
googleSheets.syncExistingHint: Export all current orders to the spreadsheet after setup
googleSheets.syncFailed: Failed to sync existing orders. You can retry later.
googleSheets.invalidUrl: Please paste a valid Google Sheets URL or spreadsheet ID
googleSheets.disconnectDescription: This will revoke access to your Google account and remove the integration. Your spreadsheet data will not be deleted.
googleSheets.insufficientPermissionsHint: You need to grant both Google Sheets and Google Drive access. Please reconnect and make sure all requested permissions are checked.
googleSheets.trackAbandonedHint: Log abandoned cart events to the spreadsheet alongside orders

events.title: {{name}} Events
events.empty: No events yet for this integration.

markets.title: Markets
markets.subtitle: Sell in different regions with local currencies and custom pricing.
markets.emptyDescription: Markets let you sell to different countries with their own currency and pricing. For example, create a "North America" market with USD currency and a "Europe" market with EUR.
markets.name: Market name
markets.slugHint: Auto-generated from the name. Used in URLs (e.g. yourstore.com?market=eu).
markets.slugLockedHint: The slug cannot be changed after creation as it's used in URLs.
markets.activeMarketNote: When off, this market won't appear to customers but stays configured.
markets.autoDesc: Apply a % adjustment to your base prices.
markets.fixedPricingNote: Use 'Set prices' to configure product prices for this market.
markets.deleteConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This market and its pricing overrides will be permanently deleted. Existing orders won't be affected.
markets.priceAdjustmentHelp: Percentage applied to base prices. E.g. +10 means prices are 10% higher, -20 means 20% cheaper.
markets.defaultMarketNote: Used as the fallback when a visitor's country doesn't match any other market.

pricing.noProducts: No products yet. Add products first.

exclusions.title: Product Availability
exclusions.subtitle: Choose which products are visible in this market.

billing.title: Billing
billing.gateDescription: Subscribe to continue managing your store. Your storefront remains live.
billing.cancelDescription: Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period. No refund will be issued for the current month. After that, dashboard access will be restricted but your storefront will stay live.
billing.cancelNoRefund: Current month's payment is non-refundable. Access continues until the end of the billing period.

shipping.noZonesDesc: Add a shipping zone to start charging delivery fees.
shipping.excludeDesc: Orders from this city will be blocked.
shipping.deleteZoneConfirm: This will permanently delete this shipping zone and all its city overrides.
shipping.duplicateCountry: A zone for this country already exists
shipping.duplicateCity: A rate for this city already exists
shipping.noCityOverrides: No city-specific rates. All cities use the default rate.
